attributes.action: Ban the use of brown parcel tape on any thing but cardboard boxes
attributes.additional_details:
Ban the use of brown parcel tape on anything other than it's intended purpose of securing cardboard boxes and packaging.
It's use for general securing and packaging of goods direct to the material in transit has now  become common place, with out a thought for the recipient having to remove the sticky brown residue from the received goods.
Having lost many man hours and damaged equipment to this menace. I think it's time the intelligent people of this fine country stand up and fight against this sticky annoyance.
